name: A plain quarterstaff of dark walnut wood (2h)
data: It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'psionic efficiency'.
It has magnificent weapon class for its type (average in general).
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users psionic resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
It increases damage a tiny bit.
